verbs.description: [ARG0: Trump] [V: believes] [ARG1: the trade deficit is a bad thing for the USA] . Other countries sell us more goods and services than we sell to them . But , a negative trade deficit is good for us . It is so good for us , it could be called a scam . Other countries ...
